<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Steal Time](/Feats.aspx?ID=3853) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 186</row>

**Archetype** [Chronoskimmer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=192)

**Frequency**
once per hour

**Prerequisites**
[Chronoskimmer Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3847)

</column>

---

You reach into another creature's timeline and attempt to alter their flow of time. Select a creature within 30 feet. That creature attempts a Fortitude saving throw against your chronoskimmer DC. The creature takes the effects of [_slow_](/Spells.aspx?ID=289) based on the result of its saving throw.
name: Steal Time
